reviewComments: A very cute shop to pick up a gift for someone special and stretch your legs while on your journey. Visit the other shops in the building while you are there.
Lona's Treasures.address: 19248 National Trails Hwy., Unit D , Old Route 66 , Oro Grande , CA 92368
